Name: Bouncy Cat
About the game: Bouncy Cat is hungry for fish and wants to play with yarn. Bounce and shrink across 60 levels to help him achieve his dreams. Collect Yarn to obtain stylish hats. Each level has 5 objectives, enhancing replayability. A game that's perfect for speedrunners. Controls Grow: Left Click/Space Shrink: Right Click/Shift Camera: Mouse Movement Movement: WASD Reset: R Menu: Escape Level Objectives 1. Beat level by collecting the fish 2. Beat the level and collect the yarn 3. Beat the level under the par time 4. Beat the level under the par time and collect the yarn 5. Beat the expert time
